Attributes.description: Investigation of an issue, topic, or phenomenon in psychology, focusing on research deeply within a subfield or integrating research across subfields.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of PSYC 217, PSYC 277 and one of PSYC 218, PSYC 278; or (b) PSYC 366. (Restricted to Majors and Honours in Psychology. Consult Section Notes or the Psychology Department website for 300-level course(s) recommended for a specific offering.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue, Start Time: 15:00, End Time: 17:30
